comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content:
Madero arrived to Mexico City on June 6, 1911.
Here are seen Francisco I(gnacio) Madero jr., to his left Mr. Francisco Madero sr. and between he and the camera man, Gustavo A. Madero.  To the right of Francisco jr. seems to be most likely Raúl Madero.
Dr. Roberto Duarte
Plastic Surgeon
